attributes.action: Cancel Trident - use money saved to help flooded communities and build flood defences
attributes.additional_details:
"We urge Her Majesty's Government  to cancel present and future spending on  another Trident nuclear weapon system (estimated at £10 billion) and to spend the bulk of the  money saved now and in the future on coastal protection and  inland flooding defences"

Supported by: Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament (CND), Pax Christi, Christian CND, ,Movement for the Abolition of War, (MAW)  Columban JPIC
